code:
import { createClient, http } from 'viem'
import { mainnet } from 'viem/chains'
import { erc7821Actions } from 'viem/experimental'

export const client = createClient({
  chain: mainnet,
  transport: http(),
}).extend(erc7821Actions())

Prettify<JsonRpcAccount<accountOrAddress>> : accountOrAddress, rpcSchema>>
import createClient

(alias) function http<rpcSchema extends RpcSchema | undefined = undefined, raw extends boolean = false>(url?: string | undefined, config?: HttpTransportConfig<rpcSchema, raw>): HttpTransport<rpcSchema, raw>

tags: Creates a HTTP transport that connects to a JSON-RPC API.
